'Visibility' develops Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) software, which targets
small to mid-sized Engineer-to-Order (ETO), Make-to-Order (MTO), Mixed-Mode and
Project-Oriented Manufacturing companies.
categories: Computer companies of the United States
